text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “E jenumanja achinawandu! Nam’baga jenumanja n’di wakaika pa dini jangu (ja Usilamu), basi (manyililani yanti) nganimba nagalagatile awala wankwagalagatila wangawaga Allah, nambo une ngun’galagatila Allah Ajula jwaakumpaga chiwa, soni namulidwe kuti mbe mwa akukulupilila.”
